basics.name: Julian Smith
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: Multifaceted Full-Stack Developer & Technical Lead with 11+ years of experience across software engineering, network infrastructure, and mission-critical satellite communications. Expert in .NET, SQL Server, and modern JavaScript frameworks (React, Next.js). A Marine Corps veteran with a proven track record of managing $2B in assets and leading complex technical operations.

work.name: Steel Dynamics
work.summary: Developed and maintained enterprise web applications using C# and the .NET framework.
highlights: Architected and optimized SQL Server (T-SQL) reports to provide the sales department with real-time data.
Utilized JavaScript and CSS to build responsive user interfaces.
Collaborated within an Agile environment to translate complex business requirements into scalable software features.

work.name: Expedition Communications
work.summary: Directed end-to-end logistics and on-site installation of high-tier network equipment.
highlights: Managed personal equipment inventory and scheduling, consistently meeting 100% of project deadlines.
Troubleshot and resolved connectivity issues on-site.

work.name: DIRECTV
work.summary: Executed high-volume satellite equipment installations and provided technical support.
highlights: Maintained high customer service ratings by educating users on system functionality.

work.name: United States Marine Corps
work.summary: Managed and maintained $2 billion in mission-critical communications equipment.
highlights: Planned and executed the rapid deployment of network and satellite systems in high-pressure environments.
Led and mentored teams of junior Marines.
Installed and configured complex network infrastructure 'on the fly'.

education.area: Computer Science, Systems Networking, and Programming
